WelcomeSection.title: Bem-vindo ao Yespo App
WelcomeSection.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc efficitur orci vel lacus pharetra, vitae gravida arcu facilisis. Maecenas ipsum dui, efficitur in pharetra ac, luctus id urna. In diam purus, lobortis sollicitudin feugiat sit amet, blandit sit amet nunc. Sed molestie id ex vitae viverra. Nulla cursus viverra ipsum eu luctus. Duis non elit ornare, vestibulum sem nec, commodo lectus.

UnsupportedMarketsSection.title: Atenção!
UnsupportedMarketsSection.description: O app suporta apenas um mercado ativo.

list.first: Connect your Yespo account using the Full Access API key. You can find the key in your Yespo account: <apiKeysLink>Yespo API Keys</apiKeysLink>.
list.second: Once the account is connected, you need to install the scripts. To do this, click the corresponding button and activate the extension for the theme.
list.third: After the scripts are installed, you can proceed to Yespo for further configuration.
list.more: For more detailed information, follow this <detailedLink>link</detailedLink> or contact Yespo support: <supportLink>Yespo Documentation</supportLink>.

errors.domainCantBeReachedError: O domínio não pode ser acessado.
errors.support: Entre em contato com o suporte da Yespo.
